original_title: Just for Laughs: The Gala Specials - Russell Peters
overview: Canada’s own comedy rockstar, the unbelievably versatile and talented comedian Russel Peters hosts this stand-up comedy special. He is joined by Dave Merheje, Sophie Buddle, Dara Ó’Briain, James Davis and Robert Kelly in this hilarious show filmed at the Just For Laughs festival in Montreal.
title: Just for Laughs: The Gala Specials - Russell Peters
